hero.title: Free Online AI Recipe Generator
hero.description: Simply select or enter ingredients, and our AI will create random, creative, and easy-to-follow recipes for you. No more "What's for dinner?" stress.

features.title: Smart AI-Powered Culinary Features
features.description: Transform your cooking journey with cutting-edge AI technology, multi-language support, stunning visual generation, and seamless cross-platform experience designed for food lovers worldwide.
features.aiGenerationDesc: Supports multiple AI language models: Deepseek, Qwen Plus, and GPT-4o Mini for optimal recipe generation
features.imageModelsDesc: Utilizes advanced image models including Wanx and Flux Schnell to create beautiful dish visualizations
features.customIngredientsDesc: Input any ingredients you have in your refrigerator for AI to craft delicious meals
features.multipleCuisineDesc: Support for global cuisine styles from Chinese to Western, Japanese to Indian
features.multiLanguageDesc: Support for multiple languages including English and Chinese to meet diverse user needs
features.responsiveDesc: Fully optimized for all devices - desktop, tablet, and mobile, providing seamless experience across all platforms
features.weeklyLimitDesc: Smart credit system for AI-powered recipe and image generation, providing balanced usage limits

recipes.title: Get Inspired
recipes.subtitle: Get inspired by our collection of delicious recipes from around the world.

services.title: Services
services.subtitle: Powerful Recipe Features
services.description: From ingredient selection to recipe generation, we provide everything you need to create amazing meals.
services.aiGenerationDesc: Transform your selected ingredients into creative and delicious recipes using advanced AI technology.
services.customIngredientsDesc: Add ingredients not in our database - AI will intelligently recognize and generate recipes accordingly.
services.recipeImageDesc: Automatically generate beautiful food images based on the recipe name using AI technology.
services.multipleCuisineDesc: Support for various international cuisines including Chinese, Italian, French, and more.
services.multiLanguageDesc: Complete Chinese and English interface to meet different users' language preferences.
services.weeklyLimitDesc: 7 free uses per week to fully experience the magic of AI recipe generation.

review1.name: Jane Doe
review1.comment: As a foodie, I crave new flavors daily. This AI recipe generator gives me creative, gourmet ideas using random ingredients. Seriously, it's like a flavor adventure – no more boring dinners!

review2.name: Mike Thompson
review2.comment: Broke college student here! This app saves me with cheap, 10-minute meals using pantry scraps. No more ramen – just real food that's actually tasty. Total lifesaver on a budget.

review3.name: Jessica Parker
review3.comment: I love fancy food but hate spending cash. This AI tool finds budget-friendly recipes that still feel gourmet. My wallet's happy, and dinner's delicious – win-win for frugal foodies!

review4.name: David Harris
review4.comment: Need healthy recipes fast? This AI generator creates nutritious, diet-friendly meals in seconds. No guesswork – just clean eating that fits my wellness goals. Game-changer for busy health nuts!

review5.name: Emily Rodriguez
review5.comment: Total kitchen newbie here – I burned toast once! But the step-by-step instructions are foolproof. Now I cook confidently. Seriously, this app makes beginners feel like pros.

review6.name: Chris Garcia
review6.comment: Working from home? This AI recipe app gives quick lunches between Zoom calls. Saves time, uses fridge leftovers, and keeps me energized. Essential for remote workers avoiding takeout!

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: New users receive 100 credits upon registration, and each recipe generation consumes 1 credit. We will soon launch service packages and reward systems to provide more ways to earn credits.
faq.q2: Can I add ingredients that aren't listed?
faq.a2: Yes! Simply type any ingredient into the search box and press Enter. Custom ingredients show up with a white background and yellow text, so you can easily spot them. Our AI will create recipes with whatever ingredients you add!
faq.a3: We first use AI to generate recipes based on the ingredients you select and input. Once the recipe is created, we use AI again to generate corresponding images based on the recipe name.
faq.q4: How long does the transformation process take?
faq.a4: Most recipes are generated in 20-60 seconds. The exact time depends on the AI model selected and current server load. During peak hours, you may experience slightly longer wait times due to high demand.
faq.q5: How can I provide feedback or report issues?
faq.a5: We'd love to hear from you! Please share your feedback or report any problems by contacting our support team at annnb016@gmail.com. Your input helps us continuously improve our service.
faq.q6: Can I use the generated images commercially?
faq.a6: Yes. The generated images are free for both personal and commercial use, but please ensure not to infringe on other brands' copyright.

footer.description: RecipeEasy is an AI-powered platform that transforms your ingredients into delicious recipes. Experience the magic of culinary creativity in seconds.
footer.copyright: © 2025 Recipe Easy. Not affiliated with recipeeasy.com.
